She stepped out of the doorway and revealed who she was referring to. Everyone's eyes grew as wide as dinner plates and their jaws were hanging wide open in disbelief at who they saw: Sly.

"How... What... When..." Bentley said in utter shock. "Surprised? No need to answer; the looks on your faces are all the answer I need," Sly said. Everyone ran (or wheeled in Bentley's case) over to Sly and hugged him tightly, having missed him so much. "We were so worried about you!" Murray exclaimed. "We had almost given up hope of ever seeing you again." "It's good to know I mean so much to you all," Sly said. "I can hardly believe I'm still alive myself." Eventually, the group hug ended.

"What happened to you," Carmelita asked? "When that blimp came crashing down, you were nowhere to be seen. And that was 7 months ago." Sly sat down on a nearby chair. "Well," he began, "I saw Le Paradox get hit by an airplane and fall to his doom, then everything went black. When I came to, I was in ancient Egypt. For 7 days, I tried to find a way back to the present, but to no avail. I was about to give up hope of ever being home again, but then Penelope showed up with a time machine."

Penelope walked over to Sly's side. "I had been thinking long and hard about what I had done for Le Paradox," Penelope said, "and I realized that I somehow had to make things right. I figured the best way to try and make up for what I had done was find Sly and bring him home." She looked at Sly's cane. "I remembered that Dr. M had planted a tracking device on Sly's cane back on Kaine Island, so I went to the wreckage of his fortress and found the device he used to track Sly's cane. I made some modifications to it so it could track the cane through time and space, and, eventually, I found where Sly had ended up and went back in time to bring him home."

Sly spoke up again. "At first, I wasn't very trusting of Penelope after what she had done." "And you had every right to be distrustful of me," Penelope added. "Yes," Sly noted. "Anyway, she told me how she wanted to make things right and make it up to us all, and that she figured bringing me home would do that. I didn't believe her at first, thinking that she had something up her sleeves, but then I thought, 'why would she go to all the trouble of tracking me down if she wanted to betray me again?' I couldn't for the life of me think of a good reason why she'd do that if she wasn't at least regretful of her actions, so I forgave her and here we are."

Bentley and the others considered everything Sly and Penelope had said. Eventually, they came to the conclusion that Sly was right. They forgave Penelope for her actions and Bentley even reconciled with her. He figured that they could try and rekindle their relationship.

Sly and the gang had even found a way to resume their occasional heists without becoming wanted fugitives. The Cooper family is known to specialize in stealing from other criminals, so Sly decided he and the gang could pull off heists that would let them help Interpol catch some of the most wanted criminals in the world.

Sly and the gang would use their various skills to find the evidence necessary to pin the criminals to their crimes, and lure the criminals out into the open so that Interpol could arrest them. Once the criminals are behind bars, Sly and co. are awarded any treasures and riches owned by the criminals they helped capture as payment. This made Sly and the gang tons of money.

Penelope was happy that her friends trusted her again, and that everything was back to normal. There was one thing that she wasn't happy with, however. For as long as she could remember, she had always wanted to be bigger; not the tiny, helpless little thing she had been for most of her life. Ever since Sly and the gang had forgiven her, she had secretly been working on something to make her at least as tall as Sly and Carmelita.

One night, while Sly was out for an evening walk, Carmelita was working late at her desk at Interpol HQ, and Bentley and Murray were spending time at the movie theater watching the newest Sci-fi action movie - something that interested both Bentley and Murray - Penelope had finished her creation; a formula designed to make her bigger. "Finally, it's finished!" She exclaimed. "Now it won't be so easy for some goon to capture me." She thought back to when she was taken prisoner by Captain LeFwee and his pirate crew. "With this, I'll be bigger and stronger. Hopefully I'll be able to defend myself against attackers if I need to." She looked at the relatively small beaker of blue liquid and smiled. "Bottoms up!" Of course, as she gently laid her Cane-Staff against Inspector Fox's empty desk and knelt down on one plump knee to put an ear against the steel safe door to perfectly hear the clicks of the dials and gears inside the vault, Sylvia smirked a little and answered, "Not yet, sweetie! I'm just about to crack this safe open."

"Yeah well, not to rush you but that Sly clone won't be able to keep Inspector Fox busy for not much longer before succumbing to exhaustion." Mz. Ruby replied, reminding the blubbery female raccoon that she might be running short on time before she was compromised. However, being the Master Thief that she was, Sylvia was able to swiftly crack the safe's combination with no difficulty, then opening the safe door, and bearing a satisfied smirk on her plump feminine raccoon snout.

"Oh come on, Ruby. It's me we're talking about, remember?" Sylvia flirtatiously remarked, as she grabbed the files from the safe's interior, then placed a modified variation of the Sly Cooper calling card, which was now a sky blue hue and bearing the initials "S.C" in bold letters front and center of the insignia. Now possessing what she intended to steal, Sylvia then grabbed her Cane-Staff and proceeded to exit Carmelita's office via fire escape, where Mz. Ruby spoke back and replied, "Just make sure ya get your fat furry rump back here in one piece."

"Of course! Never was my plan to get big ol' me arrested." Sylvia answered, just as the rotund gator gave the order to the Sly clone to retreat, where it managed to successfully shake off Carmelita during her pursuit of who she assumed to be the real Sly Cooper.
152121211122221211221121.title: Same Place, Same Safe

choices: From there, Sylvia showed Mz. Ruby the files she stole.

1521212111222212112211212.content:
However, with every great plan or heist throughout the centuries of civilization, there would always be a flaw or monkey wrench thrown into said plans. And unfortunately, that same theory applied in Sylvia's case, which appeared in the form of the Sly clone unintentionally leading the trigger-happy hot-headed vixen from Interpol known as Inspector Carmelita Fox right to the fat female raccoon's location.

Obviously, upon seeing someone exiting her office, Carmelita instantly diverted her focus onto the unknown assailant, where she then aimed her signature Shock Pistol at Sylvia and yelled, "FREEZE! Who are you? Show yourself!" Of course, knowing that she would have to confront the brazen vixen from Interpol sooner or later, Sylvia decided to reveal herself toward Carmelita, propping her Cane-Staff against the top of her right shoulder, balancing it with ease. "Name's Sylvia Cooper. You could say that I'm the new thief on the block." Sylvia answered,displaying a smug smirk on her plump feminine lips.

"A Cooper, huh? So, you must be related to that blasted Sly Cooper!" Carmelita replied, becoming a little surprised at such a revelation. However, she was completely unaware of the truth as to Sylvia's true identity. Of course, upon taking in the female raccoon's rotund appearance, she couldn't help but become confident that she could arrest this upstart thief with no difficulty. "Oh, this is too easy! How could a butterball like you ever be a thief?" Carmelita said, where she then pulled on the trigger and fired off several discharges of electricity from her Shock Pistol.

Fortunately for Sylvia, thanks to the enchanted bracelets she was wearing on her plump wrists and cankles, the fat female raccoon was able to swiftly dodge the few shots from Carmelita's Shock Pistol thanks to her magically augmented speed and agility, performing a nimble cartwheel then a powerful backflip off the fire escape and landing in the parking lot, despite being someone of her size and girth.

In turn, this left Inspector Fox in complete disbelief at what just happened, just as Sylvia looked up at the stunned vixen with a smug look on her plump raccoon snout and taunted, "So much for me being too easy for you, Carmelita!" In response to such a taunt, Carmelita's anger boiled, unleashing a barrage of electrical discharges from her Shock Pistol, venting her frustration out on Sylvia, who continued to evade the electric projectiles with minimal effort, sprinting her way across the Interpol parking lot towards the waiting big rig and trailer for a clean getaway.

Once she got inside the big rig trailer, Sylvia quickly shut the doors behind her, just as the Sly clone inside the big rig slammed it's foot down on the gas pedal, causing the vehicle to roar down the street at breakneck speeds, escaping from the persistent Inspector Fox. "You can't escape me, Sylvia Cooper! Do you hear me!?! I'LL FIND YOU!!" She screamed, yelling at the top of her lungs in an enraged state towards the fleeting big rig and trailer, vowing that she would tirelessly hunt down Sylvia to the ends of the Earth.

15212121112222121122112122.content:
(Note: This chapter will contain certain female characters from the Sly Cooper franchise, along with some original characters made for this story. Anyway, on with the show!)

Once they we're outside of the city of Paris, Sylvia Cooper and Mz. Ruby eventually returned to their hideout/home within the Haitian swamps, along with the stolen police files from Inspector Carmelita Fox's office at Interpol HQ. Although the security at the rotund gator's Voodoo lair was significantly diminished due to Sly Cooper's efforts to retrieve the stolen pages of the Thievius Raccoonus back when they first clashed, Mz. Ruby was eventually able to reinforce the bulk of her security, which ranged from Voodoo practitioners to abnormal supernatural creatures fueled by Voodoo magic.

However, they didn't just answer exclusively to Mz. Ruby, the Voodoo-wielding guards also took their orders and commands from the fat gator priestess's equally rotund lover, Sylvia Cooper, who essentially gave the scaly Voodoo priestess a heart once more, feelings in which she haven't tapped into since her childhood.

After all, knowing the overweight gator, Mz. Ruby didn't exactly have a good childhood whatsoever, especially since she was born into a family of Voodoo mystics, thus having a lack of real friend's due to such an intimidating factor, resorting to seeing the undead as the only companions she could have at that time. But now, things were much different, and for the better of course.

But as the moon slowly rose into the night sky with a crescent shape while the clicking and chirping of swamp crickets echoed throughout the nightly air, Sylvia and Mz. Ruby were both currently preoccupied on separate tasks. To elaborate, the police files that Sylvia stole from Carmelita's office back in Paris contained information about an all-new gang of criminals that recently came into the spotlight, both in the public eye, and on Interpol's Most Wanted List.

They were known as "The Femme Six", and they were definitely not the kind to be underestimated whatsoever. Sylvia continued to thoroughly read through every detail inside each of the five police files she stole from Interpol, all while lounging around in a pair of silky navy blue bras and panties. After all, the Haitian swamps were known for their humid temperatures, even at nighttime, so it only made sense to wear a light amount of clothing. Plus, Mz. Ruby didn't seem to mind if her lover was lounging around the hideout in nothing but her undergarments, yet also finding the fat female raccoon to be quite attractive in lingerie.

However, it took all of Mz. Ruby's willpower just to resist the temptation of making love with Sylvia right on the spot, as the gator Mambo (Voodoo Priestess) focused her energy and dedication into communing with the spirits on the locations of the Femme Six members. Of course, this process involved allowing herself to be possessed by these spirits, which would give the spirits access and speak through Mz. Ruby, using her body as both a catalyst and a conduit of sorts, thus creating a temporary bridge between the physical world and the Spirit World.

Once she was inevitably finished communing with the spirits, Mz. Ruby felt the spirits leave her body, thus allowing the large gator control over her physical form once more. "Did you find out where some of the members of the Femme Six are located, Ruby?" Sylvia asked, noticing that her equally bulky lover was finished communing with the spirits, while Mz. Ruby slowly waddled over toward the rotund female raccoon, where she then wrapped her plump scaly arms around Sylvia's neck in a romantic embrace, peering over Sylvia's shoulder to look at the current file that the fat female raccoon was examining and replied, "Not much to go on, hun. Details are sketchy at best, but I managed ta locate one or two members of the Femme Six. I'm guessin' you're lookin' at one of those members now?"

From there, in response to the rotund gator's question, Sylvia nodded in confirmation toward Mz. Ruby, where she then spoke toward the gator priestess and answered, "From what I've found in these files so far, there's a lot of information on the members of the Femme Six. Carmelita was definitely busy when it came to finding out who these girls are." "Alright, so... who are we gonna steal from first?" Mz. Ruby asked, curious to know which member they were going after first. However, after careful consideration, Sylvia decided that she and Mz. Ruby should go after...

152121211122221211221121221.content:
(Note: Some of the information here on this character is possibly non-canon, due to the lack of detailed information on said character. Anyway, enjoy!)

Eventually, after careful consideration on which member of the Femme Six to pursue first, Sylvia eventually decided to choose the charismatic grifter of the Femme Six, the elephant Miss Decibel. "...Well, this Miss Decibel holds some promise." Sylvia answered, where she then closed the current file she was holding, placed it back on the pile, and then pulled out the file on Miss Decibel.

From there, the fat female raccoon opened up the file on the anthropomorphic elephant, as Mz. Ruby became a little intrigued and asked, "Alright, so what does it say 'bout her?" In response to her lover's question, Sylvia began to read the information on the file aloud and explained, "Miss Decibel. Real Name: Elizabeth Jane Decibel. Age I Early to Mid 30s. Height: 8 feet 7 inches. Weight: estimated to be at 800 pounds. Well, she's certainly a little lighter than the average pachyderm."

"Well, does it say anythin' else about her, hun?" Mz. Ruby asked once more, still curious as to who this Miss Decibel was. Of course, the gator priestess was about to receive those answers, as Sylvia continued reading the file and said, "According to what Interpol was able to find out about her, Miss Decibel came from a wealthy British family in London. As a child, she loved classical music like Mozart and Beethoven, along with wanting to perform that genre of music. Unfortunately, her complete lack of musical talent, coupled with an extreme but somewhat short temper, made for a volatile combination."

"Wow, and I thought Sir Raleigh had a short fuse." Mz. Ruby remarked, seeing as how Miss Decibel's behavior reminded the rotund gator of her former colleague from the Fiendish Five, Sir Raleigh the Frog. However, Sylvia wasn't quite finished yet, as she spoke toward her equally rotund lover and replied, "And that's just the beginning, Ruby. After one particularly disappointing performance, the young Miss Decibel lashed out, launching her trumpet into the air in anger, which came back down and lodged itself in the end of her trunk."

"Shortly after that freak accident, she was left unable to play music...normally. Apparently, when she tried to remove the trumpet by blowing it out, this caused an hypnotic note to play instead, making the audience transfixed by the hypnotic sound, as they applauded for her due to being hypnotized by her hypnotic tones. Soon after realizing the power of her newfound gift, Miss Decibel turned to a life of crime. She began to use her devious talents to control others, forcing them to commit crimes for her under a state of sound-based hypnosis, thus amassing a vast fortune to almost rival Fort Knox in terms of wealth. Of course, this garnered the attention of the Femme Six, formerly known as the Femme Five at that time, who allowed her to join them as a grifter, due to her..."charismatic charm", thus becoming the Femme Six's sixth member." Sylvia explained aloud, leaving no stone unturned on Miss Decibel's backstory.

"So, I'm guessin' Interpol already knows where she's at then?" Mz. Ruby asked, wanting to know where she and Sylvia were heading next. Then, in response to such a question coming from the gator Voodoo priestess, Sylvia spoke once more, speaking toward Mz. Ruby and answered, "*sigh*...Only rumors, unfortunately. According to what information Carmelita and her fellow Interpol officers were able to collect, they're speculating that Miss Decibel might be hiding somewhere within Riyadh, the capital city of Saudi Arabia. And...that's just it, there isn't anymore info regarding Miss Decibel."

Although it appeared that they were no closer to finding Miss Decibel as Interpol were, Mz. Ruby suddenly realized that when she was communing with the spirits earlier on the locations of the Femme Six members, the spirits guided her to an ancient palace within Riyadh, known by the locals as The Murabba Palace. Upon realizing that she knew the location of Miss Decibel, the fat gator priestess then spoke toward her equally large lover and said, "...Actually, Sylvia...I think I might know where she's at."

"Wait, you do?! Well, out with it, sweetie!" Sylvia replied, turning her somewhat plump raccoon head and snout to gaze upon Mz. Ruby with a surprised look on her feminine raccoon face. From there, Mz. Ruby spoke toward Sylvia and answered, "...Well, while I was communing with the spirits using Voodoo, they only showed me two different locations, one spirit led me to a vast and ancient Chinese fortress, while another showed me a luxurious palace within the borders of Riyadh. I think the latter is where we'll find Miss Decibel."

Upon hearing such a positive revelation from the gator priestess, Sylvia quickly closed the file, stood up onto her paw-like feet, turning her rotund frame around to stare back at Mz. Ruby with an ecstatic grin on her plump feminine lips and exclaimed, "That's awesome! Oh Ruby, what would I do without you?" From there, the two equally rotund lovers engaged in a passionate kiss on the lips, then severing the kiss moments later when...

1521212111222212112211212211.content:
However, what caused such a passionate moment of romance to be abruptly interrupted originated from none other than Sylvia Cooper's large doughy belly, as it emitted these loud gurgles and growls, demanding to be fed immediately. In turn, this caused Sylvia to blush in embarrassment, while Mz. Ruby showed a flirtatious smirk on her plump reptilian snout as she said, "Sounds like a certain ringtail is feelin' mighty hungry." "What can I say, Ruby? I'm a big girl, and girls like me gotta eat." Sylvia replied, attempting to disguise her blushing in the process, but a little too late, as Mz. Ruby then waddled her way into the kitchen to get her large lover something to eat.

However, once the rotund gator priestess had returned, she brought along something unexpected: A 4-tier chocolate and strawberry cake. Due to both her newfound womanly cravings for chocolate and her increased appetite, Sylvia's mouth began to drool some in hunger, causing her blubbery stomach to growl just a bit louder than before, becoming eager to dive in and ultimately devour the delectable dessert. It took almost every ounce of willpower for Sylvia not to rush headfirst toward the cake and devour it with her own two hands. Though, one thing's for sure, Mz. Ruby could clearly see the eager but impatient anticipation on Sylvia's plump feminine raccoon face and snout.

"Well, don't just stand there, hun! Dig in! Mz. Ruby exclaimed, encouraging and enticing her equally rotund lover, causing the fat female raccoon to attack the multi-tier cake with gluttonous gusto, grabbing big handful scoops of chocolate and strawberry cake, cramming a handful of the spongy icing-covered dessert into her waiting mouth one at a time, while Mz. Ruby watched from the side, witnessing her lover's gluttonous rampage before her very eyes.

Eventually, after over an hour of gluttonous consumption, Sylvia was now laying back on a large comfy chair perfectly made for an individual of her size and bulk. As a result of her unhinged binging, her somewhat plump and feminine raccoon hands and fingers were now smeared with a coating of chocolate and strawberry frosting, while her plump feminine raccoon snout had it's fair amount of frosting smeared against the fur on her snout, complete with a bloated and stuffed to the brim belly.

Of course, becoming a little aroused from seeing her equally large lover in such a bloated state, Mz. Ruby calmly waddled over and approached the almost absurdly stuffed raccoon, pressed a plump reptilian hand against the taut furry surface of Sylvia's abdomen, where the gator priestess then began to slowly stroke Sylvia's bloated belly, rubbing it caress and in a flirtatious manner, then spoke with a seductive tone toward Sylvia and said, "My my, you've definitely went all-out on that cake there, hun! *giggle*"

"Uuuggh...Sooo...full. UUURRP!!" Sylvia muttered, inadvertently unleashing quite the loud burp in the process, causing the stuffed female raccoon to quickly cover her mouth and snout in embarrassment, displaying a deep crimson blush in reaction to such a swift release of excess stomach vapor. In response, Sylvia moved her eyes to gaze upon Mz. Ruby and said, "Erm...sorry. I didn't know what came over me."

"Don't worry, you'll get used to it. So, how was my cake?" Mz. Ruby asked, wondering if her homemade dessert was actually delicious or not, as the rotund gator priestess grabbed a moist towelette nearby and began to wipe off the chocolate and strawberry frosting from Sylvia's hands and plump raccoon snout, cleaning off the remaining residue of the cake with ease. From there, Sylvia then looked back at Mz. Ruby, licking her plump feminine lips in the process and answered, "*moan* Ohhh, it was pure heaven, Ruby! Since when did you learn how to bake a cake anyhow, sweetie?"

"Oh, it was somethin' I picked up as a hobby durin' my time in prison before I escaped, thanks to a prison riot." Mz. Ruby explained, as she put away the platter that the chocolate and strawberry cake was on into a mojo-powered dishwasher, where she then continued speaking and said, "Ever since then, it sorta stuck to me like glue." "Oh? Well, I guess that sort of explains how you got so damn good at baking." Sylvia replied, where she then began to rub the sides of her stuffed doughy belly a little relieving some of that overstuffed tension in her stomach.

However, while she was still rubbing her fattened abdomen, Sylvia eventually came up with a sound idea to help both her and Mz. Ruby on their heist against Miss Decibel, where she then spoke toward her beloved gator priestess and said, "...You know, all that cake just gave me an idea." "Oh? What exactly do ya have in mind, hun?" Mz. Ruby asked, curious to know what exactly her equally rotund lover was planning. Of course, in response to such a question coming from the large gator Voodoo priestess, Sylvia slowly sat up from her reclined position on the chair, spreading her thick legs apart to accommodate for that bit of extra girth she just received from Mz. Ruby's delicious cake.

From there, Sylvia then spoke toward Mz. Ruby, who then sat down nearby and chowed down on a homemade Steak Sandwich, keenly listening to what the fat female raccoon had to say, as Sylvia spoke up and explained, "...Well, I know you might argue with me on this, but...I was thinking that we should add a third member to our gang. You know, someone who is both a hacker and a strategist at the same time. Think about it, Ruby: We might run into a problem or two before we could pull off a successful heist on Miss Decibel."

Although her lover did sum up several valid reasons to add a third member to their gang, Mz. Ruby was a little stubborn on the matter, unsure if this new member would keep their locations a secret or not. At first, the gator priestess wanted to outright refuse Sylvia's idea. However, the more she thought about it, the more the idea actually made sense, especially if the possibility that Miss Decibel had acquired some state-of-the-art security systems was all the more a reality. So eventually, after extensive thought, Mz. Ruby was finally able to agree with Sylvia's idea, seeing the success of potential future heists, where the gator priestess then nodded in agreement toward Sylvia and answered, "*sigh*...Alright, Sylvia. We'll go with your idea."

"Aww! Thanks, Ruby!" You won't regret it, I promise!" Sylvia replied, just as Mz. Ruby then spoke toward the rotund female raccoon and said, "Yeah, yeah. I just hope you know what you're doin', because this might land us in jail if Interpol finds out where we're hiding." Of course, in response to Mz. Ruby's reasonable paranoia, Sylvia spoke toward her and replied, "Don't worry, Ruby. I happen to know the right person in mind."

Ruby asked, scratching the side of her head with a reptilian finger and claw out of slight confusion. Of course, in response toward her lover's confusion on the subject, Sylvia spoke toward Mz. Ruby, reassuring the rotund gator priestess and explained, "...Well, you see... Back when I was still in the Cooper Gang as Sly Cooper, Penelope told me, Murray, Bentley, and The Guru that she has an identical twin sister all the way back in her hometown of Kinderdijk, Holland. Her name is Annette, and Penelope told us that her twin sibling happened to be quite the expert when it comes to hacking."

"...Well now, *giggle* that DOES sound like someone we should have in our gang, Sylvia!" Mz. Ruby remarked, the present information piquing both her intrigue and curiosity. In fact, Sylvia still had a copy of the photo that Penelope showed of both her and Annette in the same picture, where the fat female raccoon then pulled out the picture from her leg satchel and displayed it in front of Mz. Ruby, both as photographic evidence, and as a way to identify which of the two was Annette.

For Sylvia, it was pretty easy to identify which of the two mice girls within the photograph was actually Annette, as the rotund female raccoon pointed a slightly plump index finger toward the chubbier female mouse and answered, "Annette is the one on the right." Upon gazing at the photo, Mz. Ruby could see that Annette was clearly much chubbier than her identical twin Penelope. In appearance, Annette had the same fur color, wore similar glasses and style of clothing, and had the same hair color as Penelope.

And yet, those were the only similarities between Annette and Penelope, as she was a few inches taller than Penelope, and appeared to be 50 to 80 pounds fatter than Penelope, displaying fuller breasts, a plump belly visible from underneath the bronze yellow T-Shirt and short denim overalls, along with a plump rump, chubby thighs and calves, and a slightly fuller face and snout. Plus, Annette's hair had much more length in the back, reaching to just above her chubby rear, which was arranged into a thick braided ponytail, all while Annette wore a pink bandana in a similar fashion to Penelope does with her own bandana.

Ruby yelped excitedly, now clearly interested in having Annette as the third member of their New Cooper Gang, along with possibly having another individual to enjoy her homemade desserts besides Sylvia, of course. Then, shortly after regaining her composure, Mz. Ruby then spoke toward Sylvia and asked, "Come on, tell me, hun! Does she have a sweet tooth?" "Even better, sweetie! Ruby a bit more eager to meet the plump rodent known as Annette.

Of course, this was before my gang and I got involved, where we won the A.C.E.S competition and we found out that Penelope and the Black Baron were one and the same."

Ruby answered, just as Sylvia spoke back toward the gator priestess and replied, "Of course, Ruby! I was making sure your memory is as sharp as a whip. Anyway, after we won the ACES competition, Penelope joined the gang without hesitation, and basically gave Annette the "keys to the castle", thus making her a powerful figure in their hometown of Kinderdijk, Holland. From what I've heard, she still continues the ACES competition, even without the presence of the Black Baron as the host of ACES."

Ruby asked, becoming aware that if she and Sylvia were to have any hope of getting Annette as the third member of their New Cooper Gang, the two equally rotund lovers would have to travel to Kinderdijk, Holland and pay Annette a visit. Of course, that was exactly what Sylvia had in mind, as the fat female raccoon placed her feminine hands against her bulging waist and hips, then nodded her somewhat plump raccoon head and snout in confirmation and answered, "Yeah, it looks that way, Ruby. And from what I've just heard recently, we're gonna have to meet Annette during this year's ACES competition. Unfortunately, unlike the last time me and my gang were there, we simply can't meet Annette by entering A.C.E.S as pilots this time around, since...well, we don't have our own plane that's made for dogfighting, and I'm not sure if we can build one in time for the competition."

"Well, that idea's a bust. So, got a better plan?" Mz. Ruby asked, wondering if her equally large lover had crafted a different plan for such a scenario. Fortunately for them both, Sylvia had already come up with a plan in mind, which involved...

Ruby's leathery reptilian cheeks out of reassurance, just as the gator priestess then spoke once more and said, "Yeah, yeah! Just promise me ya won't get reckless out there. Got it?" "I promise." However, in some form of additional effort, Mz. Ruby sent out 3 Sly Clones to perform a reconnaissance mission on the layout of Kinderdijk, along with scoping out the hotel where the ACES teams were residing at the time, feeding back valuable information to Mz. Ruby, who found out that Annette just installed surveillance cameras scattered throughout the large town. Obviously, Annette was probably increasing security due to preventing any form of sabotage from the rival teams prior to the dogfights, which now made simply sneaking into Kinderdijk undetected all the more difficult.

However, once Sylvia and Mz. Ruby boarded the private cargo plane they previously stole, along with the big rig, big rig trailer, and 2 squads of Sly Clones as backup, they both knew that there was no turning back now as the large aircraft soared off into the sky, crossing the Atlantic Ocean, and finally landing within an airport near Kinderdijk, Holland. From there, they drove off in the big rig and trailer toward their destination, while Sylvia got herself "dolled up" for her role in the rendezvous. Aside from simply putting on the dress, Sylvia wore these white silky pantyhose and blue heeled slipper shoes, along with applying some red lipstick on her plump feminine lips and some blue eyeshadow on her upper eyelids.

Although she personally preferred to stroll right in wearing her casual thieving outfit, Sylvia knew that this was a necessary sacrifice, especially since this was a formal affair, which meant wearing formal attire as well. However, little did they know, Annette was currently watching her surveillance cameras, becoming well aware of her newfound but uninvited guests, just as she watched Sylvia exiting the big rig trailer, carrying a large open umbrella, since it was currently raining outside at night. In response, the chubby mousette displayed an intrigued and curious smirk on her rodent face and snout then said, "Hmm, she seems...interesting. I wonder who she might be?"
152121211122221211221121221111.title: Holland Rendezvous Prep

choices: Once they were inside her room, Annette began to converse with Sylvia.
Meanwhile, Mz. Ruby sent out a Sly Clone to check up on Sylvia.
1521212111222212112211212211111.content:
Eventually, upon arriving at the hotel, Sylvia made her way inside the building, and waddled into the bowels of the hotel's main lobby. From there, she closed up the large umbrella she used earlier, just as the doors closed behind her. "Wow, this place still looks the same as the last time I visited Holland." Sylvia thought to herself, her light brown eyes scoping out the hotel's main interior.

However, before she could proceed any further into the building, Sylvia was immediately confronted by the hotel's concierge. Judging from the concierge's appearance, the hotel staff member was a female anthropomorphic rabbit, with her brunette brown hair neatly assorted into a bun in the back. Currently, the rabbit was wearing a fancy bright red hotel staff jacket with golden linings on her upper half, while wearing a gray business skirt on her lower half, with her rabbit tail sticking out thanks to a tail-hole in the seat of the skirt.

From there, upon confronting Sylvia, the rabbit concierge then spoke toward the fat female raccoon and said, "Name, please?" Of course, wanting to avoid revealing her true identity, Sylvia decided to divert to an alias, where she spoke toward the lapine concierge and answered, "Chelsea King." Once she received the name, the female rabbit began scrolling through the long list of numerous names within her ledger book, surfing through page after page to find the name of Sylvia's alias.

Meanwhile, just as the rabbit continued searching through the ledger, Annette calmly exited her personal quarters overlooking the main lobby area of the hotel, where she was currently wearing an elegant bronze yellow gown of her own. Obviously, she was already well aware of the fat female raccoon standing in the hotel entrance lobby. "...Well, time to meet my uninvited guest." Annette thought to herself, as she then proceeded down the flight of stairs, and calmly made her way toward Sylvia's location.

"I'm sorry, Ma'am. There is no record of a "Chelsea King" in the guest list." The concierge said, confirming Sylvia's invalidation on the list, thus denying the large female raccoon access. However, Annette came up from behind the lapine concierge, then spoke toward the female rabbit and answered, "It's okay, Juliet. "Ms. King" here was a last-minute addition to the guest list that we forgot to add on, nothing more."

"Oh! Of course, Annette." Juliet replied, as she then diverted her focus elsewhere within the hotel, leaving Sylvia at the mercy of the lapine's boss, Annette, despite their obvious height and size differences, of course. From there, Annette then gazed upon Sylvia, where the chubby mouse then spoke toward the fat female raccoon and said, "Seriously? "Chelsea King"? You could've come up with a better alias, Miss."

"*sigh*...Anyway, I recommend we take this "business" of ours in private." Annette answered, where she then guided Sylvia back upstairs to the mousette's personal quarters within the hotel, as the fat female raccoon thought to herself and said, "...Well, so much for being anonymous."
1521212111222212112211212211111.title: Meeting Annette

choices: Annette was willing to join, but...there was a problem...
Annette is unable to join, due to she's got her own problems to deal with.
Actually, Annette's response was different than expected...
15212121112222121122112122111111.content:
Simply left with no other choice in this compromising situation, Sylvia reluctantly followed Annette back to the mousette's personal quarters within the hotel, following closely behind Penelope's twin sister. Meanwhile, sitting at a table on the other side of the hotel's main lobby, a male anthropomorphic tiger cautiously gazed upon both Annette and Sylvia, smoking on the fine taste of a Cuban cigar, savoring it's flavor with each slow inhaled breath before exhaling the smoke from his maw. He watched as the two women entered Annette's personal quarters, just as the mousette closed the door behind them once she and Sylvia were inside the luxurious suite.

Meanwhile, within the luxurious condo that was Annette's personal quarters, Sylvia couldn't help but be impressed by how successful and accomplished Penelope's chubby twin sister was, especially with how the mousette was able to become quite the influential figure in Kinderdijk, Holland. Residing within the expansive suite, there was a large circular coffee table with two large crescent couches on each side of the table, which stood in the center of the room. While in the observatory section of the suite overlooking the hotel's main lobby, there was a wooden desk with a black comfy mobile chair, obviously used for business affairs, of course.

Also, there appeared to be a massive Flatscreen TV hanging on one of the walls, along with a small table that held an entertainment center like a DVD/VCR Player, Digital Cable Box, and the newest Video Game Console. From there, as she walked over toward the Kitchen and Bar Area of the suite, Annette's physical posture appeared to be a bit more relaxed than before, where she then grabbed out two glass mugs from the cupboard, and a bottle full of Schnapps from her personal stash and said, "Now that we have the necessary privacy, we can discuss more freely, away from prying eyes."

Shortly after speaking, Annette had put a few ice cubes into the mugs, where she then poured some Schnapps into each glass mug, then offered a mug out to Sylvia and asked, "Want some?" Obviously interpreting it as a bad idea to refuse her, Sylvia accepted Annette's offer for a drink, grabbing the glass mug from the mousette's grasp, then drinking a small sip of Schnapps from the mug.

Of course, Annette drank a slightly bigger sip of Schnapps than the fat female raccoon before her, where she then approached and sat down on one of the crescent couches. From there, Sylvia sat down on the crescent couch opposite of Annette, where the mousette then spoke toward the rotund female raccoon and said, "Now, allow me to introduce myself. I'm Annette Mousina, I happen to be the owner of this hotel, and also...I am well aware of who you are, "Chelsea King". Or...should I say, Sylvia Cooper!"

Upon hearing her full name being called out by the mousette, Sylvia's reaction was of slight shock, especially since she already had a feeling that her identity was compromised by now. However, she honestly was not expecting Annette to be fully aware that she was a Cooper, so she swiftly regained her composure and asked, "...Alright, you got me: I'm Sylvia Cooper. So, how exactly did you figure out who I was, anyway?" "Isn't it obvious, Cooper? I'm one of the world's best hackers! I've got eyes and ears throughout cyberspace! ...Plus, aside from my twin sister Penelope sending me postcards and letters of her travels with your relative and his notorious Cooper Gang, I know that only a Cooper would be capable of sneaking into Inspector Fox's office and stealing those files right from under that vixen's nose, despite being someone of your...mass." Annette explained, obviously somewhat impressed by Sylvia's accomplishment, especially considering the fat female raccoon's overall physique.

"Um... Thanks, I guess." Sylvia replied, not sure if she should feel proud or a little insulted by the mousette's words. From there, after taking another sip of Schnapps from the glass mug, Annette then spoke once more toward the fat female raccoon and asked, "...Well, since we're talking, it's obvious that you're here because of me. So, tell me: what exactly do you want from moi?" Then, while the mousette took a few more sips from her glass mug, Sylvia then calmly spoke toward Annette and answered, "...Annette, I want you to join my gang."

"Oh? Now...Why would you want me to join your gang anyway, ringtail?" Annette asked, becoming a little curious as to what the reason was for recruiting the mousette hacker in the first place. So, in response to such a question coming from Penelope's twin sister, Sylvia then spoke once more and answered, "...We're going after the Femme Six. And my gang needs someone of your...unique skills, to aid us in this endeavor. So, will you help us?"
15212121112222121122112122111111.title: A Conversation & A Bargain

choices: Of course, Sylvia decides to help Annette with her "problem".
However, they were interrupted by the concierge, Juliet.
152121211122221211221121221111111.content:
Although the offer to formally join Sylvia's own Cooper Gang was mighty tempting, especially when Annette could potentially show off her proficient hacking prowess. Unfortunately for the fat female raccoon, things were a bit more...complex, than they appear. "*sigh*...As much as I am quite tempted to join your gang for such a grand adventure against the Femme Six, Sylvia, I'm afraid I must reluctantly decline your...offer." Annette said, as she stood up from the couch and walked over toward her office desk.

Of course, in response to an answer, Sylvia then spoke with a somewhat surprised reaction on her plump feminine raccoon face and snout, looking at the mousette and asked, "Why? Do you have a problem that needs sorting?" "Hmph! I wouldn't call this a simple "problem", ringtail." Annette answered, showing a hint of annoyance at what sort of problem she's forced to deal with. From there, Annette pulled out her laptop, where she pulled up several digital files on her laptop's monitor and said, "Here. See for yourself."

Out of curiosity, Sylvia then stood up from the couch, as she waddled toward Annette, who turned the laptop around to show what she brought up toward the large female raccoon. Upon looking at the laptop screen, Sylvia could see several digital, most likely hacked from Interpol's criminal database, where all of the files created a fully-fledged dossier of a male anthropomorphic Siberian Tiger from Cuba known as "El Jefe".

"You're wondering why I simply can't join you, Sylvia? Well, that's why." Annette answered, confirming that El Jefe was indeed the source of her current problems as of late. From there, Sylvia looked back at the laptop screen, reviewing the information from the multiple digital files on El Jefe. According to his dossier, El Jefe was a high-ranking mercenary commander who managed to conquer many small countries across the entire world, selling them off to the highest bidder. However, being a military strategist of the highest rank, he once boasted that he was capable of conquering a country using only three blind mice, armed with nothing more than plastic spoons at their disposal. El Jefe vanished into obscurity sometime after Interpol forces were closing in on his operation.

And unfortunately for Annette, she now had to deal with the narcissistic soldier of fortune. Though, one thing still bothered Sylvia, as she spoke toward the mousette and asked, "Okay, so... if this is bad news, then why is he participating in ACES?" "Hmph, that's only a facade! Unfortunately for me, what El Jefe is really after, Sylvia, are my servers, which are essentially my backdoor access to multiple bank accounts to the rich and powerful. If that damned tiger gets his power-hungry claws on that, he'll be capable of overthrowing much larger countries like China or Russia. So, yeah, of course I'm worried as hell!!" Annette exclaimed, showing how greatly concerned she was against El Jefe.
152121211122221211221121221111111.title: The Mousette's Problem
